channel.title: Error Shuts Down Server

item.title: Error Shuts Down Server
item.description:
@360236 wrote:

Seems everyday when I am off this error occurs:

EventManager.java:

// process all events for (EventContainer container : events) { if (container.isRunning()) { if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - container.getLastRun()) >= container .getTick()) { try { -- LINE 101 -- container.execute(); } catch (Exception e){e.printStackTrace();} } if (container.getTick() < waitFor || waitFor == -1) { waitFor = container.getTick(); }

I am not sure why I get this error. But it will continue to shut down my server if I donâ€™t get it fixed.

If you have any idea, Id appreciate it.

Thanks.

Read full topic
